pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Soap 3x125g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Skin Care Soap Bars cleanse and purifies.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Skin Care Soap cleanses and purifies all skin types.



Product not tested on animals.

Size: 3 x 125g


Warnings

Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Cocoate, Water, Coconut Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Titanium Dioxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Etidronic Acid.

Directions

For external use only. Wet skin. Apply sufficient quantity to create a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
